headline: The J.M. Smucker Co. Completes the Divestiture of Voortman速 Brand to Second Nature Brands and Updates Fiscal Year 2025 Net Sales Outlook
summary: The J.M. Smucker Co. (NYSE: SJM) ("Company") announced today the closing of the transaction to divest the Voortman速 business to Second Nature Brands. The Company previously announced the signing of a definitive agreement for the transaction on October 22, 2024. The all-cash transaction is valued at approximately $305 million, subject to a working capital adjustment, and reflects the Company's continued commitment to optimizing its portfolio and reallocating resources to its core growth brands.
